text: - [iA Writer]({{$url0}}): In my opinion, it's the best Markdown syntax editor, with simplicity as its main advantage but it falls short in note organization and lacks related features.
- [Paper]({{$url0}}): A great candidate to replace iA Writer, the writing experience is even better. Unfortunately, the app has some bugs and limitations, making it suitable only for simple notes.

- [Obsidian]({{$url0}}): An app I rarely write in and usually just paste content from iA Writer or Paper. But itâ€™s great for organizing content. Paired with [Vitepress]({{$url1}}), I can share most of my notes online as a static website.

- [Notion]({{$url0}}): It's the final app where I primarily collaborate with others to create content, share it, or leverage automation. Notion stands out as the sole editor mentioned that offers an API, enabling integration with my services.
- [Wooting 60HE]({{$url0}}): A high-performance keyboard used for typing in full-screen mode while writing.
- [Spotify]({{$url0}}): Listening to music during work sessions.
- [Endel]({{$url0}}): Enhances focus and provides ambient soundscapes while working.
- [Xnapper]({{$url0}}): Taking screenshots efficiently.
- [ray.so]({{$url0}}): Generating code snippets via Puppeteer automation macro.
- [TinyPNG]({{$url0}}): Optimizing images with automated macros.
- [Dropshare]({{$url0}}): Sharing images and files seamlessly.
- [DigitalOcean]({{$url0}}): Hosting images and files.
- [Paste]({{$url0}}): A clipboard manager for easier text editing and accessing previously copied content.
- [Linear]({{$url0}}): Organizing tasks with automation and GPT-4 prompts for efficient workflow management.
- [Todoist]({{$url0}}): Task management tool with robust API support.
- [Make.com]({{$url0}}): Automation platform used for integrating and automating various tools and workflows.
- [Superhuman]({{$url0}}): An email client used in conjunction with Gmail/Google Workspace for enhanced email management.
- [Google Workspace]({{$url0}}): Essential for email and integrates with Superhuman for productivity.
- [Zencal]({{$url0}}): Booking calendar slots with automation capabilities.
- [Notion Calendar]({{$url0}}): A calendar app with intuitive keyboard shortcuts and a minimalist interface.
- [Arc Browser]({{$url0}}): The main browser used on macOS and iOS, featuring a Command Bar and Little Arc for improved browsing experience.
- [Feedly]({{$url0}}): Staying updated and monitoring news with API integrations for automation.
- [Product Hunt]({{$url0}}): Discovering new tools and products.
- [daily.dev]({{$url0}}): Staying updated with the latest development news and tools.
- [Indie Hackers]({{$url0}}): Networking and discovering indie projects and tools.
- [HackerNews]({{$url0}}): Keeping up with tech news and discussions.
- [Figma]({{$url0}}): Designing UI and promotional materials with components and auto-layout features.
- [Adobe Photoshop Beta]({{$url0}}): Editing images and assets with Generative AI features.
- [Midjourney]({{$url0}}): Generating various graphic or asset variants using Generative AI.
- [Adobe Firefly]({{$url0}}): Editing images generated in Midjourney for final touches.
- [Webflow]({{$url0}}): Creating and editing graphics based on templates, often automated with HTMLCSSToImage.
- [HTMLCSSToImage]({{$url0}}): Converting HTML and CSS templates into images for automatic graphic generation.
- [IntelliJ IDEA]({{$url0}}): The main code editor used for programming in TypeScript and Rust, customized for efficiency with keyboard shortcuts.
- [Supermaven]({{$url0}}): An intelligent code suggestion tool, alternative to GitHub Copilot.
- [iTerm]({{$url0}}): A preferred terminal application for its simplicity and performance.
- [TablePlus]({{$url0}}): A powerful database client for macOS.
- [Raycast]({{$url0}}): Enhancing productivity by allowing search and execution of menu items and actions without keyboard shortcuts.
- [GitHub Actions]({{$url0}}): Automating application deployment processes.
- [Shortcuts]({{$url0}}): Automating tasks and workflows on macOS.
- [Keyboard Maestro]({{$url0}}): Creating and managing macros for automating repetitive tasks.
- [Better Touch Tool]({{$url0}}): Enhancing touchpad and mouse functionalities with custom gestures and shortcuts.
- [Goodreads]({{$url0}}): Logging and tracking books read, sharing highlighted passages and notes.
- [Amazon Kindle]({{$url0}}): Reading e-books with synchronized progress across devices.
- [Audible]({{$url0}}): Listening to audiobooks with synchronized progress across devices.
- [Nvidia GeForce Now]({{$url0}}): Streaming games from a Steam account to various devices.
- [Steam Deck]({{$url0}}): A portable gaming device for gaming on the go.
- [Nintendo Switch]({{$url0}}): A popular gaming console for a wide range of games.
